# Family and childcare – Welcome Point

URL: https://wtp.agh.edu.pl/category/living-in-krakow/family-and-childcare/
Crawled: 2025-03-19 21:24:01

Family and childcare

Living with your family in Krakow

You may be entitled to draw child benefit if you meet the specific requirements. Check out the documents below (Guidebook for Krakow families UMK and Welcome Home- a guide for foreigners living in Krakow) for more info.
Read more..

Day care centres and schools

Family care for children under 3: https://www.gov.pl/web/family/care-for-children-under-the-age-of-3 https://empatia.mpips.gov.pl/web/piu/mapa-zlobkow-i-klubow-dzieciecych Kindergartens:
Read more..

Events and activities for children

Kids in Krakow – a guide More info Kids in Kraków – Krakow events, places, fun and activities for kids In Krakow kids can have fun in plenty of dragon squares. Use the following link to find the map: Map of dragon squares
